N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1157.7 - FEIS procedures

State Regulations
(a) If, after the completion of the DEIS, the receipt of comments on the DEIS and after
the close of public hearing, if held, the authority determines that the
proposed action of the authority or the proposed project or activity of an
applicant may have a significant effect on the environment, the authority shall
prepare or cause to be prepared and file an FEIS in accordance with the
provisions of SEQR. However, if the authority requests an applicant to prepare
a supplemental environmental report, the authority shall not commence
preparation of the FEIS nor cause its preparation to be undertaken until a
completed supplemental environmental report is received. (b) Upon completion of the FEIS, the
authority shall send and file notices of completion of the FEIS in the same
manner as is required for sending and filing of notices of completion of the
DEIS pursuant to subdivision (c) of section
1157.6
of this Part. The FEIS
shall be filed in the same manner as is required for a DEIS pursuant to
subdivision (d) of section
1157.6
of this Part. (c) The authority shall maintain a file or
files open to public inspection which contains the FEIS's and notices of
completion for all FEIS's it has prepared or has caused to be
prepared. Notes
